author: Special Correspondent
text:
Thieves burgled two houses in Kansa Mettu Street here on Thursday, and decamped with over 13 sovereigns of gold, two and a half kg of silver articles and Rs. 50,000.

Police said Manju Devi and Jowar Singh had gone out around 6.30 p.m. When they returned home, they found that both their houses – one on the first floor and the other on the third floor – were broken open.

While Ms. Manju Devi lost three sovereigns of gold, two and a half kg of silver articles, a laptop and Rs. 40,000, the other victim lost over 10 sovereigns of gold and Rs. 10,000.
title: Two houses burgled
